item.title: Week 2: Visualizing Data
item.description: Grammar of Graphics & ggplot This week we will be discussing what qualities makes a graphic legible and how we can use R to implement readability using the Grammar of Graphics. | Tasks | Notes | Links | Due | | ——– | ————- | —— | —- | | | | | | -Add links to The Pudding and make it a reading response (https://pudding.cool/) - add ggplot flipbook (https://evamaerey.
